name: Shikari 100 prototype
description:
University assignment. April 2021

20-minute prototype

Gamepad required (Xbox 360 or similar)

This is a university team project, which became Solar Flare's 'Shikari X' (https://solar-flare-london.itch.io/).

Credits:

Sam Mortimer -- Designer & coder

Max Elmore -- Designer & producer + additional graphics & code

Vlad Tipu -- Designer & 3D modeller
